title: Nahanni
brief_description: The legend of a lost gold mine and a river in the Northwest Territories that lures men to their doom. Albert Faille, an aging prospector from Fort Simpson, has set out time after time to find hidden gold. His route is through a wild, awesome land particularly suited to the mood of this Canadian odyssey.
